urls.title: Vacancies - Don Catchment Rivers Trust
urls.description: Vacancies Agricultural Officer – application deadline extended.  This role is an exciting opportunity to work with farmers and landowners in the Don Catchment for the benefit of people and the environment. We are seeking a candidate with experience, knowledge, and/or a background in farming to support landowners in the delivery of Natural Flood Management, and […]

text: The deadline for applications for our new Agricultural Officer post is this Friday at noon ... you can download the job description and application form from our website here: https://t.co/h7Ps0okxsn @theriverstrust @YorkshireWater @HighwaysEngland @EnvAgencyYNE

urls.title: Police team up to target metal and waste crime, protect heritage and the environment - North Yorkshire Police
urls.description: A national clampdown – details of which can be revealed today – has seen forces across the country focus on metal theft, including the theft of catalytic converters, to prevent an increase in offending as lockdown restrictions ease. The theft of metal is often linked to organised crime, and North Yorkshire’s isolated, rural areas can […]

text:
We've been working with @EnvAgency @CityofYork & many others to tackle metal theft & waste crime: 

⛪ 40 heritage sites patrolled
🚛 100+ vehicles stop checked
🚩prohibitions issued
🕵️‍♀️ waste crime investigations ongoing

Find out more: https://t.co/2orlTZoaUK

📸 @Harrogate_News https://t.co/TirIK3LdS6
